plot: A comedic-educational series that teaches nonpartisan political concepts. Vermin Supreme is running for president, but to win, he and his staff must first learn the facts about politics.
title: Learnin' with Vermin
plot_es: A comedic-educational series that teaches nonpartisan political concepts. Vermin Supreme is running for president, but to win, he and his staff must first learn the facts about politics.
plot_en: A comedic-educational series that teaches nonpartisan political concepts. Vermin Supreme is running for president, but to win, he and his staff must first learn the facts about politics.
